title: StarHeroes
description: StarHeroes is the first-ever multiplayer space shooter crafted for e-sports, where every match is a high-octane test of skill and strategy. Dive into adrenaline-fueled, fast-paced battles and prove your dominance in the galaxy!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# StarHeroes is the first-ever multiplayer space shooter crafted for e-sports, where every match is a high-octane test of skill and strategy.
<!--text-->
Jump into fast-paced intense 3v3 battles in this third-person multiplayer space shooter, where both flying and shooting skills are key to victory. 

Pilot customizable ships in engagements that push your reflexes and tactical thinking to the limit. Do you have what it takes to dominate the galaxy, Pilot?

<!--image-->
![StarHeroes-1fs33](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/a7404a8c5cf94150ad64e5dfbef54680/starheroes-1fs33.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ACTION-PACKED GAME MODES
<!--text-->
Test your skills and strategy in thrilling modes, where every second counts, and victory requires both precision and teamwork.

**STARPUSH**: A strategic, objective-based mode where teams push vital objects like the StarSeed toward the enemy base. Navigate through three dynamic phases, collect StarDust for key advantages, and outmaneuver your opponents to dominate the battlefield.

**DEATHMATCH**: Engage in a high-octane combat mode where teams must eliminate opponents in a race to dominate. Rely on sharp reflexes and expert shooting to achieve victory.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# BUILD & CUSTOMIZE YOUR GALACTIC FLEET
<!--text-->
Choose from five classes of specialized combat ships - **Shooter, Tank, Support, Engineer, and Hitman** - each with unique combat abilities. Customize your ships with powerful offensive, defensive, and utility items to suit your playstyle.

<!--image-->
![StarHeroes-93uxz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/a7404a8c5cf94150ad64e5dfbef54680/starheroes-93uxz.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# CONQUER TACTICAL MAPS
<!--text-->
Battle across four highly strategic maps like Orionis Prime or Noxx Colony, with hidden routes, shipwrecks, and terrain designed to offer positional advantages for teams that can outthink and outmaneuver their opponents.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# MASTER PRECISION COMBAT
<!--text-->
Wield a range of precision-focused weapons like the **Pulse Cannon** for devastating burst damage or the **Disruptor **for intense close-range engagements. Victory demands a perfect blend of sharp shooting and expert flying skills.

<!--clickableImage-->
[![StarHeroes-sogb1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/a7404a8c5cf94150ad64e5dfbef54680/starheroes-sogb1.png)](https://discord.com/invite/starheroesgame)
